name: Remove a book
description:
In order to keep the bookstore accurate and up to date,
  as an authorized user I want to add, view, edit, and remove books.
descriptionHtml:
In order to keep the bookstore accurate and up to date,
as an authorized user I want to add, view, edit, and remove books.

steps.name: Given I have valid permissions to manage the bookstore
And I have some unique data of a book
Given a book exists in the bookstore

parameters.name: book
parameters.value: Book[id=1793315513, title=The Painted Veil, description=Asperiores laborum voluptates beatae., pageCount=672, excerpt=Tempore eveniet facilis quae illo. Corrupti debitis soluta iusto repellendus reiciendis laudantium. Veritatis praesentium temporibus debitis corrupti aut., publishDate=2025-09-21T06:08:59.778588414Z]

steps.name: When I remove that book from the bookstore
Then the book no longer appears in search or details
